title: Function Concepts-Graphical and Analytical: Exponential, Part A

content.question: Part A ​​​(i) The function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is defined by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses g ring operator f close parentheses open parentheses x close parentheses equals g open parentheses f open parentheses x close parentheses close parentheses"> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> <mo>=</mo> <mfenced> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mo>∘</mo> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mfenced> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> <mo>=</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mfenced> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> </mrow> </mfenced> </math>. Find the value of <math alttext="h open parentheses 3 close parentheses"> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mn>3</mn> </mfenced> </math> as a decimal approximation, or indicate that it is not defined. (ii) Find all values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> for which <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 1"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, or indicate that there are no such values.

Find the value of <math alttext="h open parentheses 3 close parentheses"> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mn>3</mn> </mfenced> </math> as a decimal approximation, or indicate that it is not defined. (ii) Find all values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> for which <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 1"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, or indicate that there are no such values.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
